An application for tracking moods.

    Get ElasticSearchObjects using elasticsearch or add/update ElasticSearchObjects using elasticsearch.

    Get ElasticSearchObjects using elasticsearch or add/update ElasticSearchObjects using elasticsearch.

    For adding or updating objects using elasticsearch.
    ElasticSearchController.DeleteItems<T extends ElasticSearchObject>
    For deleting objects using elasticsearch.
    ElasticSearchController.GetById<T extends ElasticSearchObject>
    For getting an object by ID.
    ElasticSearchController.GetCount<T extends ElasticSearchObject>
    For counting the number of objects that match the given restrictions.
    ElasticSearchController.GetItems<T extends ElasticSearchObject>
    For searching for objects that match the given restrictions using elasticsearch.
    ElasticSearchController.GetTermAggregations
    For getting term aggregations (number of occurrences for terms) via elasticsearch.
    ElasticSearchController.RefreshIndex
    For refreshing an elasticsearch index to ensure changes are visible everywhere.

    An object that works with elasticsearch methods in the controller classes.

    Represents an elasticsearch object field and it's (expected) value.

    Represents an elasticsearch object field and it's (expected) possible values.

    Stores an Account and Posts for the current user

    ShowMapActivity  
    SignInActivity
    SignInActivity allows the user to sign in, or navigate to the account creation activity has only two functions implemented with buttons: Sign in, and Create Account Sign In button checks the entered username and password textfields using elasticsearch Upon finding a match, corresponding profile is stored in LocalDatare and user is directed to the newsfeed activity Create Account button redirects the user to CreateAccountActivity
    SimpleLocation
    Stores location with latitude, longitude, and altitude.

    ViewPostActivity  
    ViewProfileActivity
    The activity for viewing the Profile of a user and the mood history of that user.
